pageContent: Background: Little is known about the health-related quality of life (HRQOL) of men living with advanced prostate cancer. We report population-wide functional outcomes and HRQOL in men with all stages of prostate cancer and identify implications for health-care delivery.

metaData.source:
Neighborhood social capital and incidence and mortality of prostate cancer: a Swedish cohort study
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/33886095/
